name: get-merged-pull-requests-action
description: GitHub action that compares two tags and retrieves all pull requests merged between them.

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run package && npm test
scripts.bump-patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run readme && npm run all
scripts.bump-minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run readme && npm run all
scripts.bump-major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run readme && npm run all
scripts.update-v1: git tag -sfa v1 -m "Update v1 tag" && git push origin v1 --force

author: Van Ons
